title: One Piece: Episode of Sorajima (One Piece: Episode of Skypiea)
synopsis: The special will be the first in the "Episode of" series to cover the Skypeia arc, and will feature a character who did not appear in the original Skypeia arc from the anime.
characters: ['Monkey D., Luffy', 'Roronoa, Zoro', 'Sanji', 'Nico, Robin', 'Tony Tony, Chopper', 'Usopp', 'Nami', 'Enel', 'Montblanc, Norland', 'Wiper']
